title: copying Spanish text from Word to PDF
content:
I have a Word document in Spanish, I need to copy/paste that text into a PDF and the font needs to match "UMJCOM+QuicksandBook Regular." The text copies all correctly in that font except tht any letter with an accent copies as an empty space. Any help or ideas?

Thanks  
Maggie
author: mdc882000

comments.content: Hello, I'm new to this forum and just happened to see your message on this section. I wonder if you ever resolved your issue. If you still need help please let us know. I'm puzzled by the UMJCOM in front of the font name. I'm not familiar with that.
